amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding (with no offset) for necessary detention bed space, personnel, and removal costs by approximately $2.1 billion in order to end "catch and release".

action.text: Mr. Rogers (KY) raised a point of order against the Reyes amendment (A020). Mr. Rogers stated that the amendment violated the Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Reyes.
